solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--        public int findMaxConsecutiveOnes(int[] nums) {--newline--            int maxHere = 0, max = 0;--newline--            for (int n : nums)--newline--                max = Math.max(max, maxHere = n == 0 ? 0 : maxHere + 1);--newline--            return max; --newline--        } --newline--    --newline--}
